prompt: Why are you running for Congress and what makes you the best candidate to represent the 11th District?
What is your go-to breakfast sandwich and where do you get it?
How will you address the rising cost of rent and homeownership in NJ-11?
What is your plan to attract high-quality jobs and support small businesses in the district?
How will you work to lower healthcare premiums and expand access to care for all residents?
What other policy issue is most important to you and how would you address it in Congress?
What is the most important message you want voters to take away from your campaign?
